page.title: 19ART AND CRAFT
page.content: Most art and craft takes place in the Meopham area, many clubs meet in the village hall. There are no clubs at Sole Street.Adults have to go to Cobham or Meopham to join art clubs or societies. The Flower Arrangers of Meopham meet on the first Wednesday of each month at 2.l5 p.m. At their meetings they sometimes have a demonstrator who shows them ways of arranging flowers.Other times they have a practical meeting when they practise their own arranging. There are 34 members at the Wednesday meetings and 45 at the Thursday meeting. The flower arrangers grow their own flowers. There is an art and craft club which meets at Meopham School each Tuesday.
